snippet: After several reports of cheating by teachers and administrators in city schools came to light this summer, the education department announced it would create a task force to confront the issue.
abstract: New York City's Department of Education says it will establish task force to investigate allegations that city principals and educators have been engaging in grade inflation and helping students cheat on tests; announcement follows several reports of alleged cheating.
lead_paragraph: After several reports of cheating by teachers and administrators in city schools came to light this summer, the education department announced it would create a task force to confront the issue.

headline.main: New York City Task Force Targets Cheating by Teachers and Principals
headline.print_headline: Cheating by City Teachers Is Target of New Task Force
